item.title: [DELTA] Spirit shield specs NOW 100% ON PLAYERS
item.dc:creator: @Pker_DX Pker DX
item.description:
@Pker_DX wrote:

[quote=“Null Amount, post:4, topic:527005”][quote author=Pker DX link=topic=645755.msg4344431#msg4344431 date=1375663612]

How about the rest of the spirit shields? The effect that the Divine/Elysian shield produces is also incorrectly done. Regardless, thanks for releasing.

Elys is 100%
Divine just needs to have prayer removal written
Others dont have effects ??
[/quote]No it’s not 100%.[/quote]
ill add 100% to both and edit the OP

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Spirit shield specs NOW 100% ON PLAYERS
item.dc:creator: @Pker_DX Pker DX
item.description:
@Pker_DX wrote:

Under

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 && specialAmount > 49){ AttackingOn2.specGFX(341); specialAmount -= 50; hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee); lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(1658); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); specOn = false; }
For working on players
Add
if(playerEquipment[playerShield] == 10198 && misc.random(9)==0){
AttackingOn2.hitDiff -= (hitDiff * 0.8);
AttackingOn2.sM(“Your opponents elysian spirit shield blocks some of your damage!”);
sM(“The elysian blocks damage!”);
}
if(playerEquipment[playerShield] == 10202 && playerLevel[5] > 0){
AttackingOn2.hitDiff -= (hitDiff * 0.7);
double absorbed = hitDiff * .3;
hitDiff -= absorbed;
playerLevel[5] -= (absorbed) * .5;
AttackingOn2.sM(“Your opponents divine spirit shield blocks some of your damage!”);
sM(“The divine blocks damage!”);
}
What it does
Ely : Multiplies hitDiff by 0.8 and takes that off hitDiff (20% reduction)
Divine : (If you have pray)
Multiplies hitDiff by 0.7, double absorbed multiplies this by 0.3
Absorbed is subtracted from hitDiff
Prayer is drained by absorbed multiplied by 0.5

Read full topic
item.source: [DELTA] Spirit shield specs NOW 100% ON PLAYERS
